# Problem 1

## Mr. Trash Wheel
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

prob1 = read_excel("./data/HealthyHarborWaterWheelTotals2018-7-28.xlsx", sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel", range = "A2:N338")

prob1 = janitor::clean_names(prob1)

na.omit(prob1)

```
